H0.text: Jose Mourinho was appointed manager of which football club September to December 2000 - his first managerial post. FC Porto

H1.text: Jose Mourinho was appointed manager of which football club September to December 2000 - his first managerial post. Sporting CP

H2.text: Jose Mourinho was appointed manager of which football club September to December 2000 - his first managerial post. Boavista

H3.text: Jose Mourinho was appointed manager of which football club September to December 2000 - his first managerial post. Bnefica

A4.text: The chance to become a top-tier manager arrived in September 2000 when Mourinho was appointed as the replacement for Benfica manager Jupp Heynckes after the fourth week of the Primeira Liga.

A5.text: He left the club on 5 December 2000 after just nine league games in charge.

A6.text: Jos√© Mourinho had previously worked for FC Porto alongside Bobby Robson.
